page.title: 09NORMAN NICHOLSON, OBE, POET.
page.content: Norman Nicholson is a famous poet.He lives in Millom.He went to school in Millom.He caught T.B. as a child.He enjoys watching cricket but he hasn't got the talent to play.He has earned money by writing poems all his life.When he was younger it was very dull.Lots of people were very poor.It was a hard time when he was younger.His mother died when he was five.When his mother died he was very shocked and he forgot everything.His father remarried when he was eight.When he was at school he used to write the odd poem.His first poem was about September.Then after that they got better.He likes music as well as writing poems.It takes him about three months to write a poem.On his bookshelf he keeps all his books in the order that they were published.
